ruleEntry.formula: RecordType.Name = "PO Review" && (ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Region__c, "APJ") || ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Region__c, "INDIA") || ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Region__c, "JAPAN") || ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Region__c, "SEA") || ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Region__c, "CHINA") || ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Region__c, "SPA") || ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Region__c, "SAPAC") || ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Region__c, "APAC") || ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Region__c, "XS") )

RecordType.Name = "PO Review" && (ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "EMEA") || ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Region__c, "EUROPE") || ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Region__c, "MEA") || ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Region__c, "EUROPE EXC RUSSIA") || ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Region__c, "IMEA") ) && ISPICKVAL(Account.LOB__c, "Financial")

RecordType.Name = "PO Review" && (ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "EMEA") || ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Region__c, "EUROPE") || ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Region__c, "MEA") || ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Region__c, "EUROPE EXC RUSSIA") || ISPICKVAL(Account.Account_Region__c, "IMEA")) && (ISPICKVAL(Account.LOB__c, "Hospitality") || ISPICKVAL(Account.LOB__c, "Retail") || ISPICKVAL(Account.LOB__c, "T&T") || ISPICKVAL(Account.LOB__c, "Travel"))

RecordType.Name = "PO Review" && (ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "Namer") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "Namer CFI") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "BRAZIL") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "CLA") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "Namer MAJORS") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "CLA BRAZIL") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "PUBLIC SECTOR") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "WALMART")) && ISPICKVAL(Account.LOB__c, "Financial")

RecordType.Name = "PO Review" && (ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "Namer") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "Namer CFI") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "BRAZIL") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "CLA") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "Namer MAJORS") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "CLA BRAZIL") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "PUBLIC SECTOR") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "WALMART") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "AMERICAS") || ISPICKVAL( Account.Account_Region__c, "GLOBAL")) && (ISPICKVAL(Account.LOB__c, "Hospitality") || ISPICKVAL(Account.LOB__c, "Retail") || ISPICKVAL(Account.LOB__c, "T&T") || ISPICKVAL(Account.LOB__c, "Travel"))
